actions: The goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
*Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:* +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. *Hit:* 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
name: Goblin Boss
reactions: When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.
traits: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
